scenario_file_docs: Path to the scenario instructions file.
active_agents_docs: List of agent IDs (integers) to include in the simulation.
vote_thresholds_docs: Consensus percentages required for phase changes and interventions.

vote_thresholds.phase_change_docs: Percentage of agents required to agree to move to the next phase.
vote_thresholds.intervention_docs: Percentage of agents required to agree to request human intervention.
